businessChallenge: First of a Kind Project & lot of research was required demonstrating the use of the modules in gaming
Led the project both from research, pursuit and delivery

description.description: Evil Geniuses is esports organization with over 180 championships under our belt, competing in some of the biggest titles

designAndPlan: Identify and Finalize the Opensource tools along with the customer
Planning implementation of code, data and Architecture designs
desiredOutcome: Record scrims or practice games with custom module on OBS studio,
Separating audio & video from the recording
Transcribing audio files to understand sentiments of the players, speaker diarization, intra & inter-speaker lags etc.
Visualizing the correlation between speakers, time spoken, lags, sentiments to various game events
nodes.heading: EVIL GENIUSES
hpeSolution: Gaming analytics and enabling ML to guide, show and analyze matches through different advanced ML algorithm
implementation: Implement the solution agreed with the customer
Developing video recording & transcription solution  along with NLP solutions
Host the services & dashboard on AWS platform to make  them available to customer
inventoryAndAssessment: Propose various ML driven solutions to provide insights of gaming
Finalise the use case to implement
nodes.title: evil geniuses
valueDelivered: Establishes AI road map to support use cases on team performance
Delivers audio analysis platform to understand and enhance team communication
Grows competitive edge positioning the organization to get more players fans and wins
AI can dig deeper into the data games to identify patterns & trends to uplevel team skills
AI is defining new winning strategies and uncovering talented players located anywhere
AI can act as a digital coach to point out room for improvements in any manner.
